Title: Establishes the crimes of unsolicited disclosure of an intimate image in the first and second degrees
Summary: Establishes the crimes of unsolicited disclosure of an intimate image in the first and second degrees; provides that a person is guilty of unsolicited disclosure of an intimate image when, with intent to harass, annoy or alarm another person he or she sends by electronic device an unsolicited intimate image to such other person.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of unsolicited disclosure of an intimate image
